Raise CollectionChanged event to any listeners.
Properties/methods modifying this ObservableCollection will raise a collection changed event through this virtual method.
member.remarks: When overriding this method, either call its base implementation or call to guard against reentrant collection changes.

member.name: T:BlackSharp.Core.Extensions.Helper.Default`1
member.summary: Provides a default value for the specified type parameter, including special handling for arrays and enumerable types.
member.remarks: For array types, the default value is an empty array instance. For enumerable types, the default value is an empty array if compatible; otherwise, a NotImplementedException is thrown. For strings and other types, the default value is the result of the default(T) expression. This class is intended for internal use and may throw exceptions for certain enumerable types that do not have a well-defined default value.
member.typeparam: The type for which to provide a default value.

.

member.name: T:BlackSharp.Core.Reflection.ShallowCopy
member.summary: Provides static methods for performing shallow copies of value type properties between objects of the same type.

member.name: M:BlackSharp.Core.Reflection.ShallowCopy.CopyValueTypeProperties``1(``0,``0,System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Copies all writable value type and string properties from the source object to the target object of the same type.
member.remarks:
Only properties that are value types, strings or objects (where the assigned value is a value type) and are writable, are copied.
Reference type properties other than string and object are not copied.
Both source and target must be non-null and of the same type.
member.typeparam: The reference type whose properties will be copied.
member.param: The object from which property values are copied. Cannot be null.
The object to which property values are assigned. Cannot be null.
A bitwise combination of values that specifies which properties to include.
